title: 01/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The NFL should postpone the AFC Championship if Mahomes can't play

-Deshaun Watson to the Jets makes perfect sense for everyone involved

-Why are the Seahawks even interviewing Adam Gase?

-Colin has a crazy idea about Bill Belichick

-Tom Brady changed the Bucs culture, not Bruce Arians


Guest: Jay Glazer, FOX Sports NFL Insider

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
